metadata.title: CVE-2022-4344 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Memory exhaustion in the Kafka protocol dissector in Wireshark 4.0.0 to4.0.1 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.9 allows denial of service via packet injection orcrafted capture file

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
